TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit TempFileCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.IDisposable
Public Class TempFileCollection Implements ICollection, IDisposable
public ref class TempFileCollection : IDisposable, System::Collections::ICollection

summary.span: 表示暫存檔案的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of temporary files.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用來產生唯一的檔案名稱以及要追蹤的檔案清單。 can be used to generate unique file names and to keep track of a list of files. 這可以用於實施者管理的編譯器產生中繼檔案清單，有時會在使用後刪除時。This can be useful to implementers when managing a list of compiler-generated intermediate files, which are sometimes deleted after use. 若要指定要產生唯一的暫存檔名的目錄，請使用適當的多載的建構函式。To specify a directory to generate unique temporary file names in, use an appropriately overloaded constructor. 您也可以使用建構函式多載，以指出是否加入至集合的檔案應該如果未指定，否則使用時或方法，集合已處置時，才能刪除或方法呼叫。You can also use a constructor overload to indicate whether files added to the collection should, if not specified otherwise when using the or methods, be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 可以加入任何目錄中的檔案執行個體使用方法。A file in any directory can be added to an instance of using the method. 若要產生的暫存檔案的特定副檔名的唯一名稱，請呼叫並指定要產生的檔案名稱的副檔名。To generate a unique name for a temporary file of a particular file extension, call and specifiy the extension of the file name to generate. 方法會傳回字串，其中包含所指定的目錄中指定之副檔名的檔案名稱的完整路徑屬性。The method will return a string consisting of a full path to a file name of the specified extension in the directory specified by the property. 方法只會傳回一個唯一的檔案名稱，每個檔案的副檔名。The method will only return one unique file name per file name extension. 同時和方法具有多載，可讓您指定在處置集合時，是否應該刪除的檔案或方法呼叫。Both the and methods have overloads that allow you to specify whether the files should be deleted when the collection is disposed or the method is called. 方法會刪除除外標記為要保留集合中的所有檔案。The method will delete all the files in the collection except those that are marked to be kept. 屬性會指出基底檔案名稱，不含檔案名稱副檔名，用來產生所傳回的檔案名稱的完整路徑方法。The property indicates a full path to the base file name, without a file name extension, used to generate the file names returned by the method. > [!NOTE] > 這個類別包含的連結要求和繼承要求套用到所有成員的類別層級。This class contains a link demand and an inheritance demand at the class level that applies to all members. A立即呼叫者或衍生的類別並沒有完全信任權限時，會擲回。A is thrown when either the immediate caller or the derived class does not have full-trust permission. 如需安全性需求的詳細資訊，請參閱[連結要求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)和[繼承要求](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9)。For details about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9). ## Examples 下列範例示範使用類別和和方法。The following example shows the use of the class and the and methods. [!code-csharp[System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection/CS/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.CodeDom.Compiler.TempFileCollection/VB/program.vb#1)]

span.span: for deriving from the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

summary.span: 使用預設值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with default values.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是預設建構函式會初始化具有預設設定的集合。This is a default constructor that initializes the collection with default settings. 根據預設，此暫存檔案集合會將檔案儲存在預設的暫存目錄，而且它們有產生並使用後刪除暫存檔案。By default, this temporary files collection will store the files in a default temporary directory and will delete the temporary files after they have been generated and used.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory that is set to delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

Public Sub New (tempDir As String, keepFiles As Boolean)

param.name: tempDir
param.span: 用來儲存暫存檔的暫存目錄路徑。

span.span: A path to the temporary directory to use for storing the temporary files.

param.name: keepFiles
param.span: 如果暫存檔應該在使用後保留，則為 ；如果暫存檔應該在使用後刪除，則為 。

span.span: if the temporary files should be kept after use; if the temporary files should be deleted.

summary.span: 使用指定的暫存目錄，以及指示是否要在暫存檔產生並使用過後加以保留或刪除的指定值，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified temporary directory and specified value indicating whether to keep or delete the temporary files after their generation and use, by default.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`keepFiles`用來設定參數。The value of `keepFiles` is used to set the parameter. 集合中的暫存檔案要保留或刪除完成時的值為基礎的編譯器活動集合中的屬性。The temporary files in the collection are retained or deleted upon the completion of compiler activity based on the value of the property in the collection. 將每個檔案加入至集合中，目前的值是相關聯，除非加入方法，該方法具有`keepFile`參數，在此情況下，值會用於該特定檔案。As each file is added to the collection, the current value of is associated with it, unless it is added with a method that has a `keepFile` parameter, in which case that value is used for that specific file. 當呼叫方法時，如果是`true`，會刪除所有檔案，包括加入值`true`。When the method is called, if is `true`, all files are deleted, including those added with a value of `true`. 這可讓特定的檔案，這些識別為保留的檔案，以暫時保留進行錯誤報告，例如在編譯後再刪除不再需要時。This allows specific files, those identified as being keep files, to be temporarily retained after compilation for purposes such as error reporting, then deleted when they are no longer needed.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個類別無法供部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

summary.span: 將具有指定副檔名的檔名加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance string AddExtension(string fileExtension) cil managed
Public Function AddExtension (fileExtension As String) As String

param.name: fileExtension
param.span: 要加入集合之自動產生暫存檔名的副檔名。

span.span: The file name extension for the auto-generated temporary file name to add to the collection.

summary.span: 將具有指定副檔名的檔名加入至集合中。

span.span: Adds a file name with the specified file name extension to the collection.

returns.span: 具有指定副檔名的檔名，這個檔名剛加入至集合中。

span.span: A file name with the specified extension that was just added to the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回具有指定之副檔名已加入至暫存檔集合的檔案名稱。This method returns a file name with the specified extension that has been added to the temporary files collection. 其他程式碼必須仍會建立檔案，才可以使用。Other code must still create the file before it can be used. 因為它會傳回相同的名稱，如果呼叫使用相同的副檔名，則可以針對每個檔案名稱副檔名，一次呼叫這個方法。This method can be called only once for each file name extension, because it will return the same name if it is called with the same extension.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Delete() cil managed

summary.span: 刪除這個集合中未標記成保留的暫存檔。

span.span: Deletes the temporary files within this collection that were not marked to be kept.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會檢查以判斷是否要保留或刪除檔案，個別地集合中的每個檔案。The method examines each file in the collection to determine, on an individual basis, whether the file is to be kept or deleted. 檔案可以明確地標示為要加入至集合的使用將採用的方法時，保留`keepFile`參數。Files can be explicitly marked to be kept when added to the collection using add methods that take a `keepFile` parameter. 將檔案加入至集合時沒有多載`keepFile`參數值的屬性做為預設保留檔案指標。When adding a file to the collection using the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter the value of the property is used as the default keep file indicator.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性地釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會呼叫公用`Dispose()`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose()` method and the method. `Dispose()` 叫用受保護`Dispose(Boolean)`方法`disposing`參數設定為`true`。`Dispose()` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 叫用`Dispose`與`disposing`設`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. `disposing` 參數為 `true` 時，這個方法會釋放 參考的任何 Managed 物件所掌握的資源。When the `disposing` parameter is `true`, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 這個方法會叫用每個參考物件的 `Dispose()` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose()` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以被其他物件呼叫多次。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 覆寫 時，請小心不要參考到先前已在對 的早期呼叫中被處置 (Dispose) 的物件。

span.span: When overriding , be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 如需有關如何實作，請參閱[實作 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 如需有關和，請參閱[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 在記憶體回收重新宣告物件前，嘗試刪除暫存檔。

span.span: Attempts to delete the temporary files before this object is reclaimed by garbage collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會覆寫並清除資源，藉由呼叫`Dispose(false)`。This method overrides and cleans up resources by calling `Dispose(false)`. 覆寫 `Dispose(Boolean)` 以自訂清除。Override `Dispose(Boolean)` to customize the cleanup. 應用程式程式碼不應該呼叫這個方法。物件的`Finalize`方法會自動叫用記憶體回收期間，除非已停用記憶體回收行程的最終處理的呼叫所方法。Application code should not call this method; an object's `Finalize` method is automatically invoked during garbage collection, unless finalization by the garbage collector has been disabled by a call to the method. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[Finalize 方法和解構函式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70)，[清除 Unmanaged 資源上](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)，和[覆寫 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。For more information, see [Finalize Methods and Destructors](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/fd376774-1643-499b-869e-9546a3aeea70), [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md), and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool KeepFiles { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 呼叫 方法或處置集合時，根據預設值取得或設定值，指出是否保留檔案。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to keep the files, by default, when the method is called or the collection is disposed.

value.span: 如果應該保留檔案，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the files should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性做為預設值時沒有多載`keepFile`參數呼叫暫存檔案加入至集合。The value of the property is used as the default value when the overload that does not have a `keepFile` parameter is called to add a temporary file to the collection. 每個集合中的暫存檔案有關聯的保留檔案旗標來判斷是否要保留或刪除該檔案，以每個檔案為基礎。Each temporary file in the collection has an associated keep file flag that determines, on a per-file basis, whether that file is to be kept or deleted. 檔案會自動保留或刪除上完成編譯根據其關聯的保留檔案的值。Files are automatically kept or deleted on completion of the compilation based on their associated keep files value. 不過，編譯完成之後，保留的檔案可以釋放藉由設定false，且呼叫方法。However, after compilation is complete, files that were kept can be released by setting false and calling the method. 這會導致刪除所有檔案。This will result in all files being deleted.
